name: Metapoudar
description:
Game for two players. They need shoot monsters and the boss. Left player: moving WASD shooting Y. Right player moving Arrow Keys shoot Enter.  Both players need  touch the transmission area,  in the wall. For fill number of bullets.  Space button, restart the game, after loose.

Created for Global Game Jam 2018.  By me and my student Ayman from Ramat Haifa Residence.
